languages.text: The Drusians believe in continuing Mankind's crusade and bringing new worlds into the Imperium's fold. They value asceticism, self-sacrifice, loyalty to the cause, and fearlessness — just as their patron saint once did.
languages.original_text: Друзианцы верят в продолжение Крестового Похода Человечества с целью присоединения новых миров к Империуму. Подобно своему святому покровителю, они ценят аскетизм, высокие моральные принципы, преданностью идее и бесстрашие.

traits.locale_text: The Drusians believe in continuing Mankind's Crusade and bringing new worlds into the Imperium's fold. They value asceticism, high moral standards, loyalty to the cause, and fearlessness — just as their patron saint once did.

The Drusians believe in continuing Mankind's Crusade and bringing new worlds into the Imperium's fold. They value asceticism, high moral standards, loyalty to the cause, and fearlessness — just as their patron saint once did.

The Drusians believe in continuing Mankind's crusade and bringing new worlds into the Imperium's fold. They value asceticism, self-sacrifice, loyalty to the cause, and fearlessness — just as their patron saint once did.

languages.text: Друзианцы верят в продолжение Крестового Похода Человечества с целью присоединения новых миров к Империуму. Подобно своему святому покровителю, они ценят аскетизм, высокие моральные принципы, преданностью идее и бесстрашие.

Die Drusianer glauben daran, den Kreuzzug der Menschheit fortzusetzen und neue Welten in den Schoß des Imperiums zu holen. Sie schätzen Askese, Selbstaufopferung, Treue zur Sache und Furchtlosigkeit – genau wie einst ihr Schutzpatron.
languages.original_text: The Drusians believe in continuing Mankind's crusade and bringing new worlds into the Imperium's fold. They value asceticism, self-sacrifice, loyalty to the cause, and fearlessness — just as their patron saint once did.

traits.locale_text: Die Drusianer glauben daran, den Kreuzzug der Menschheit fortzusetzen und neue Welten in den Schoß des Imperiums zu holen. Sie schätzen Askese, Selbstaufopferung, Treue zur Sache und Furchtlosigkeit — genau wie einst ihr Schutzpatron.

languages.text: Les Drusiens croient en la poursuite de la croisade de l'Humanité et en l'intégration de nouveaux mondes dans le giron de l'Imperium. Leurs principales valeurs sont celles de leur saint patron : l'ascétisme, l'abnégation, la loyauté envers la cause et la bravoure.
languages.original_text: The Drusians believe in continuing Mankind's crusade and bringing new worlds into the Imperium's fold. They value asceticism, self-sacrifice, loyalty to the cause, and fearlessness — just as their patron saint once did.

traits.locale_text: Les Drusiens croient en la poursuite de la Croisade de l'Humanité et en l'intégration de nouveaux mondes dans le giron de l'Imperium. Leurs principales valeurs sont celles de leur saint patron : l'ascétisme, l'abnégation, la loyauté envers la cause et la bravoure.

languages.text: 德鲁苏斯坚信人类帝国会继续扩张，致力于将新世界带入帝国的怀抱。他们重视禁欲主义、自我牺牲、心怀忠诚、无所畏惧——正如圣德鲁苏斯本人拥有的美德。
languages.original_text: The Drusians believe in continuing Mankind's crusade and bringing new worlds into the Imperium's fold. They value asceticism, self-sacrifice, loyalty to the cause, and fearlessness — just as their patron saint once did.

traits.locale_text: 德鲁苏斯坚信人类帝国会继续扩张，致力于将新世界带入帝国的怀抱。他们重视禁欲主义、自我牺牲、心怀忠诚、无所畏惧——正如圣德鲁苏斯本人拥有的美德。

languages.text: ドルスス教は、人類の”聖戦”を継続し、新たな世界を帝国の傘下に収めることを信条としている。かつて彼らの守護聖人がそうであったように、彼らは禁欲主義、自己犠牲、大義への忠誠、そして大胆不敵であることを重んじる。
languages.original_text: The Drusians believe in continuing Mankind's crusade and bringing new worlds into the Imperium's fold. They value asceticism, self-sacrifice, loyalty to the cause, and fearlessness — just as their patron saint once did.

traits.locale_text: ドルスス教は、人類の”聖戦”を継続し、新たな世界を帝国の傘下に収めることを信条としている。かつて彼らの守護聖人がそうであったように、彼らは禁欲主義、自己犠牲、大義への忠誠、そして大胆不敵であることを重んじる。

languages.text: Los drusianos creen en la continuación de la cruzada de la Humanidad y en la incorporación de nuevos mundos al redil del Imperium. Valoran el ascetismo, el autosacrificio, la lealtad a la causa y la intrepidez, tal y como hizo en su día su santo patrón.
languages.original_text: The Drusians believe in continuing Mankind's crusade and bringing new worlds into the Imperium's fold. They value asceticism, self-sacrifice, loyalty to the cause, and fearlessness — just as their patron saint once did.

traits.locale_text: Los drusianos creen en la continuación de la cruzada de la Humanidad y en la incorporación de nuevos mundos al redil del Imperium. Valoran el ascetismo, el autosacrificio, la lealtad a la causa y la intrepidez, tal y como hizo en su día su santo patrón.

languages.text: Drususçular, İnsanlığın cihadını sürdürmenin ve yeni dünyaları İmparatorluk cemaatine katmanın şart olduğuna inanırlar. Çileciliğe, fedakârlığa, davaya olan sadakate ve korkusuzluğa değer verirler. Tıpkı bir zamanlar koruyucu azizlerinin yaptığı gibi.
languages.original_text: The Drusians believe in continuing Mankind's crusade and bringing new worlds into the Imperium's fold. They value asceticism, self-sacrifice, loyalty to the cause, and fearlessness — just as their patron saint once did.
